message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire it at a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I really like the product, but $18000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it, which is the maximum I can afford.

I understand that $18000 is a bit high for you, but I still think the product is worth more than $12000 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $16000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I understand that you're not willing to go any lower than $16000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14000. I think this is a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $15500. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $14000. I think this is a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious offer at this price.
